Uses of Interface
org.jcvi.jillion.trim.Trimmer

  • Packages that use Trimmer 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.trim  
    org.jcvi.jillion.trim.trimmomatic
    This package contains trimmer implementations based on the popular Trimmomatic program.

    • Uses of Trimmer in org.jcvi.jillion.trim

      Subinterfaces of Trimmer in org.jcvi.jillion.trim 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  NucleotideTrimmer 
      interface  QualityTrimmer 
      Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.trim that implement Trimmer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BwaQualityTrimmer 
      Methods in org.jcvi.jillion.trim that return Trimmer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends Trace>
      Trimmer<T>      		 BwaQualityTrimmer.createFor(PhredQuality threshold)
      Create a new BwaQualityTrimmer instance with the given quality threshold that will trim Traces by their quality sequence.
      static <T> Trimmer<T> BwaQualityTrimmer.createFor(PhredQuality threshold, Function<T,QualitySequence> mapper)
      Create a new BwaQualityTrimmer instance with the given quality threshold that will trim Traces by their quality sequence.

    • Uses of Trimmer in org.jcvi.jillion.trim.trimmomatic

      Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.trim.trimmomatic that implement Trimmer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LeadingQualityTrimmer
      Trims off the bases from the leading (5') edge of a read that have quailty values below the given threshold.
      class  MaxInfoTrimmer
      QualityTrimmer implementation of Trimomatic's MaximumInfo algorithm which is an adaptive quality trimmer which balances read length and error rate to maximize the value of each read.
      class  SlidingWindowQualityTrimmer
      A QualityTrimmer implementation that uses a sliding window of the given length to trim off the 3' end of reads whose average quality inside the window drops below the specified required minimum value threshold.
      class  TrailingQualityTrimmer
      Trims off the bases from the trailing (3') edge of a read that have quailty values below the given threshold.
